    • Uses of Shader in wobani.resources.shader

      Subclasses of Shader in wobani.resources.shader 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BlinnPhongShader
      This shader can draw meshes and splines by using the Blinn-Phong shading.
      class  EnvironmentShader 
      class  ShadowShader
      This shader can render the shadow map.
      class  SkyBoxShader
      This shader can draw a skybox.
      class  SolidColorShader
      This shader can render Renderabes by drawing them with one color.
      class  TexturedQuadShader
      This shader can render an image to a quad.

    • Uses of Shader in wobani.resources.shader.postprocessing

      Subclasses of Shader in wobani.resources.shader.postprocessing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FxaaShader
      Performs FXAA.
      class  GammaCorrectionShader
      Performs gamma correction on the image.
      class  GrayscaleShader
      Makes the image grayscaled.
      class  InvertShader
      Inverts the image's colors.
      class  ReinhardToneMappingShader
      Performs Reinhard tone mapping on the image.
